r:recipe.r:title: Sri Lankan runner bean curry (BBC Good Food)

r:method.r:step: In a blender, combine the onion, turmeric, ginger, garlic and 1 tbsp of the oil together with a large pinch of salt
Heat the remaining oil in a shallow pan
Add the mustard seeds and curry leaves, and cook until they crackle
Add the onion paste and cook until sticky
Stir through the curry powder, then pour in the coconut milk
Add the cinnamon and the chilli, and bring to a simmer
Tip in the beans and simmer for 15 mins or until the beans are tender
Squeeze in the lime juice, add the garam masala, take the pan off the heat and stir
